name: Armed Forces War
short_description:
This idea is in super early brain storming stages.
Idea was created based on most modern day warfare games are troops on the ground with some air support. Imagine a full armed forces armed forces war.. include battle ships, air craft carrier, sub-marines from the navy. Include A/C 130's, Airwaxes, stealth bombers from an offsite airforce base. Lots of cruise missle, toma hawks and laser guided missles. Lots of commander ops to work in tandem with front line troops and 

Massive Multiplayer War Game
250 on 250+ 5 on 5 commanding ops
Faction 1) Navy – Carrier Fleet ( Air Craft Carrier/ Battleships/Sub Marines
Faction 2) Air Force- Fighter Plans/Bombers Planes/Stealth fighters/A-Wax Surveillance Planes/AC-130 Support
Faction 3) Infantry – Army/Marines Combat Troops/Mortar/Sniper/Rocket Attack and Support Vehicles
The Map consists  water with navel fleet on either side. (Attackable) Off site air force base (Attackable)
Objective portion of the map
summary: Navy/Army/Marines Objective based large scale war
